DOC.brief_summary: To assess pelvic floor symptom quality life elderly woman .
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Symptoms Quality Life Elderly Women - Population-based Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The aim ass pelvic floor symptom quality life elderly woman . The study conduct population-based 100-130 woman age 64-66 year . All study object examine gynecologically vaginal ultrasound . Subjective symptom evaluate validated questionnaire concern pelvic floor symptom , sexual symptom quality life . This pilot study large scale population-based study .
DOC.criteria: All woman one municipality age 6466 year willing participate study . Persons guardianship understand use questionnaire .
